QuestData.Title: Rheastrasza's Gift
QuestData.Description: Wait here. I will retrieve the egg.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wait as Rhea retrieves the egg from the Hidden Clutch.
QuestData.RewardText: Thankfully, you have avoided Deathwing's notice. Rhea and the black dragon egg, however, may not have been so lucky...

Objectives.Objective: Wait for Rhea to retrieve the egg
